description.english: Where are you going to find enough rations to feed all these guys

You did it! You picked the boring ending, and nobody is proud of you.
You're such a rebel! Always doing the unexpected. We approve.
How did you find it?! It's supposed to be a secret!!!
You've unlocked the Full Auto RNG mode. All you had to do was play a bit of the story. Wasn't that hard, was it?
See how long you can survive in this game mode featuring the Full Auto kill squad.
Take these two badass bikers for a spin in SRIS space.
You did pretty good when the loot never ran out. But...what about now?
She's got a giant hammer and a bad attitude. And she probably needs a spanking.
You'll need all the resources you can get to keep this bad girl safe from the monsters.
Four robots of the night will do anything when the price is right. Just make sure to bring lots of lube.
They'll have to scavenge everything if they want to go the distance.
Society has turned their backs on these lunatics, and that's just how they like it. From the back, y'know. Wink wink. Nudge nudge.
Remember to establish dominance quickly, or you'll be calling one of these felons "Daddy".
He's big. He's pokey. He goes down like a CHUMP.
His reach is surprising. And watch out for that third hit. :x
Who's huge, hard to take down, and yells a lot? THIS GUY!!!
Not a lot of extra armor plating where it matters, but his stinger will take out a raider in one hit.
For copyright reasons, we can't bring up the visual similarity to a certain plumber's arch-nemesis. So, we won't. But we won't stop you from thinking it.
Ok, so this guy really didn't need any additional armor. But we gave it to him anyways, because screw you. YEAH I SAID IT.
You can't cuddle with him, no matter how cuddly he looks. Unless you want to be eaten.
He wears the bones of his fallen comrades to channel their rage directly into your raider's face.
Score a basket with a human head.
Score a basket with anything. Yep, even the landing gear counts.
One angry man. A legion of wriggling worms. Let the blood flow.
Don't let the pilot's taunts distract you from your main mission: squishing every mediocre maggot on the planet.
Mr. Akbar won't get his 72 virgins if he goes alone. He needs to take at least 10 infidels with him.
If you thought the ideal orgy would have an even mix of men to women, I have news for you. That is not the case, my friend.
Every raider should know that you can't get between a McAmerican and their fries. Someone always pays.
Really? You let him die first? What about all those other lambs that could have been sent to the slaughter?
You lost a few bitches, but you know what? You kept the not important one. Good job.
Everything needs to be black, white, and red. Be mindful of you accessorize.
Kill 66 humans
Kill 666 humans
Kill 6,666 humans
Kill 66,666 humans
You beat the story "Sacrifice" on its hardest difficulty. Still not as hard as making it to wave 50 in Endless, but still pretty neat. Go buy yourself something nice.
You're so damned edgy you couldn't even stay near the center of the  map. Had to build a new base with blackjack and hookers.
He wouldn't last a second in the ring with a real MMA fighter, but don't tell his mom that. She's so proud of him.
She was passed over for a promotion yet again, and now she's determined to bring down the patriarchy. With a knife.
Officer Carl brings his riot shotgun everywhere, especially underprivileged communities.
Nobody will be surprised when he shows up at the pub with blood spatters on his sleeve and files a "Missing Persons" report for his wife.
This go-getter will stop at nothing to protect his country. Or the one he illegally snuck into.
HE IS NOT COMPENSATING FOR ANYTHING. IT IS MERELY AN EFFECTIVE TOOL.
His favorite day at work involves a no-knock raid and people who "resist arrest".
If he buys just one more camo vest, his mom swears she will kick him out of her basement. This secretly terrifies Cletus.
She's not obese - she just has a medical condition. Known as "eats-too-much-cake-itis".
